src_original: ko'smākaṁ vṛddha iti ;  tataḥ kapiṁjalena vaṭavṛkṣo darśitaḥ :  bhavantaḥ eṣa vaṭavṛkṣaḥ kena kiyatpramāṇo dṛṣṭa iti ;
mayā yūthena sahānena pathā gacchatā ayaṁ dṛṣṭo matpramāṇa eva uccatveneti ;
tgt_original: 「我昔見此樹在我腹下，今大如是。 以此推之，我應為長！

src_original: mayā yūthena sahānena pathā gacchatā ayaṁ dṛṣṭo mama tulya evoccatveneti ;  te kathayanti :  tvam asya vṛddha iti ;  śaśaḥ kathayati :  mayāpy asya dvipatrakasya patreṣv evāvaśyāyabindavo jihvayā nirlīḍhā iti ;
te kathayanti :  tvam apy anayor vṛddha iti ;

paśyata yūyam enaṁ vaṭavṛkṣaṁ mahatpramāṇākāram ;  te kathayanti :  paśyāmaḥ ; etasmān mayā phalāni bhakṣayitvāsmin pradeśe uccāraḥ kṛtas tasmād ayaṁ jāta iti ;  * te kathayanti :  yady evaṁ tvam asmākaṁ sarveśāṁ vṛddha iti ;
tgt_original: 「我於必鉢羅林中，食此樹果，子隨糞出，此樹得生。
